title: Four Seasons Hotel Amman promotes Mali Carow to Hotel ManagerTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Four Seasons Hotel Amman promotes Mali Carow to Hotel Manager
Four Seasons Hotel Amman announces the promotion of Mali Carow to Hotel Manager, where she will take on the role of overseeing and managing the day-to-day operations at the property in Amman.
Mali joined the team in Amman in May 2014 as Food & Beverage Director, overseeing all kitchens, in-room dining and banquet events, in addition to food and beverage operations for six diverse restaurants and lounges. In her new role as Hotel Manager, Mali will continue to support the property in maintaining its leading position among business and leisure travellers to Jordan’s capital city.
Commenting on her promotion, Mali states, “I am honoured to have received this promotion, and in parallel with the team in Amman, I look forward to bringing exceptional levels of service synonymous with the Four Seasons brand to guests visiting this fascinating city.”
Four Seasons Hotel Amman is Mali’s 7th Four Seasons hotel that she has been a part of since the year 2000. She kicked off her career as a food and beverage server at Four Seasons Hotel Chicago and Four Seasons Hotel Washington DC, and for the next 10 years she continued to move up the food and beverage ladder until she became Director of Food and Beverage at Four Seasons Resort Maldives at Landaa Giraavaru before making her move to Amman, Jordan.
